comments:
If some projects are closed org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui clutters the error log with resource not found  exceptions. This happens each time you run the profiler,delete the profiler data (under PID) etc.

The projects/resources are closed on purpose by the developer since he/she does not need it at the moment neither are they relevant for the current profiling scenario.

org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui keeps generating these errors and clutters the error log burying other important errors and warnings.

Please remove this behaviour. Neither error/nor warning is necessary.

Similar bugs have been reported for eclipse platform and other plugins but not TPTP agent so I chose to log a new one.
